name: 2DPlatformer (Rcade218)
description:
This is Project 3: 2DPlatformer. This is the Tutorial Submission. The WebGL file did not work properly, will have it fixed by next week. The three proposed are the following:

1) Three custom music pieces

2) Three different levels

3) Recoloring the character for different levels of the game

Created by Ronit Kiri
